title: AlignedAxis
description: An aligned axis represented by a unit vector which can optionally vary over time.

unitCartesian.description: The axis specified as a three-dimensional unit magnitude Cartesian value `[X, Y, Z]`, in world coordinates.

unitSpherical.description: The axis specified as a unit spherical value `[Clock, Cone]`, in radians. The clock angle is measured in the XY plane from the positive X axis toward the positive Y axis. The cone angle is the angle from the positive Z axis toward the negative Z axis.

reference.description: The axis specified as a reference to another property.

velocityReference.description: The axis specified as the normalized velocity vector of a position property. The reference must be to a `position` property.
